origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompetitorAPI.get_global_strategy', 'description': 'This function retrieves the global strategy data for a specified company and its competitors.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'competitors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of competitor company names.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategy_data', 'description': 'The global strategy data for the company and its competitors.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CompetitorAPI.get_global_strategy, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Alibaba', 'competitors'是['Amazon', 'eBay'].
